text: The following is an image of the Chennai 02 Data Center.
We operated 2 data center facilities in Noida, as of June 30, 2025.

Our data center in Noida, Delhi ("Noida 01"), is a data center with a built IT power capacity of 10.96 MW, as of June 30, 2025. At the Noida 01 Data Center, we offer Hyperscaler cloud deployment, colocation and managed services, DRaaS, cloud adjacency and CDN services. The Noida 01 Data Center is a carrier-neutral facility, and has dual meet-me-rooms and multiple telecom service providers and ISPs for delivering a redundant and robust telecom network to clients. The Noida 01 Data Center is a high-performance data center, which means that it delivers resiliency and high-availability with near-zero latency.

The Noida 01 Data Center provides services to a range Hyperscaler clients, and enables Enterprise clients, including OTT players, and Enterprise clients in BFSI, manufacturing, media and entertainment, and healthcare and pharma sectors to run their mission-critical applications.
